descriptionHtml:
[youtube]SAN-h_bkpEA[/youtube]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------


Sorry.I don't speak English. I'm relying on machine translation.
Please forgive my poor English.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=3][color=Yellow]What is This ?[/color][/size]

This strengthens Alduin violently. which are very flashy and overpower.
Battle with Alduin will be spectacular.

The balance is not good at the moment.
I intend to improve balance by update.
I am unable to return comments, as my native language is not English, but I will watch them carefully for comments and bugs.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=3][color=white]Installation[/color][/size]

This mod has four degrees of difficulty.
[u]You choose favorite one, and, please install it.[/u]


[b][color=#b6d7a8]Easy[/color]　[/b]
This is the easiest.
Health of Alduin does not change so much with Vanilla.
However, the large meteor is very dangerous.
[color=#000000][b]
[/b][/color][color=#b6d7a8][color=#f4f4f4][b]Alduin's Health　3000~4000[/b][/color]
[/color][b]
[color=#ffe599]Normal[/color][/b]
This is my recommendation.
Second battle only, If the Alduin falls below 50% health,Completely restore health. Then, shade of alduin appears.
Also, Alduin increase the resistance to wearing a barrier.

[color=#f4f4f4][b]Alduin's Health　4000~5000[/b][/color]

[color=#ff7700]Hard
[/color]The more powerful than normal.
From this difficulty, Alduin to summon minions.

[color=#f4f4f4][b]Alduin's Health　5000~7500[/b][/color]

[color=#e06666]Legendary
[/color]This is the most difficult...so crazy.
I made ​​this with the intention of the joke.
The really great if you win this Alduin!

[color=#f4f4f4][b]Alduin's Health　7500~10000[/b][/color]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=3][color=#8fbc8f]Optional File[/color][/size]

After installed one of the main file, Please overwrite.
Alduin Retexture file & Alduin's Fire Retexture File

[img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3936/15594519566_a5ce9704d5_o.png[/img]
[img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5601/15594559346_b32d5bb994_o.jpg[/img]


----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#a2c4c9][size=3][b]Misc[/b][/size][/color]

A strong item is placed in two places.
If you have a hard fight,please use it.

[img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3941/15432202167_9972992f46_o.jpg[/img]

Location : [color=#76a5af]Throat of the World[/color]

[img]https://farm4.staticflickr.com/3950/15615527891_6d6bbce4c4_o.jpg[/img]

Location : [color=#76a5af][color=#ffd966]Sovngarde Hall of Valor [/color]

[color=#ffffff][color=#ffffff][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5598/15615528081_4521cd6189_o.jpg[/img]
[/color]
[u][color=#ffe599]He sells a potion of restore health.
[/color][/u]

[Heading]Credit & Special Thanks[/heading]
[b]Meshes & Textures
More Dramatic Alduin Retexture by lightningo
Cloaks of Skyrim by Nikinoodles

Script Source
TK Combat by tktk[/b]

[b]Sound Effect
Music-Note.jp http://www.music-note.jp/
[/b]
[b]Video Music
音楽素材『甘茶の音楽工房』http://amachamusic.chagasi.com/

[/b]I used it in addition to some modifications.
Thanks a lot, and I praise them.

[heading]Log[/heading]
2014 - 10.25　1.0 Release. [/color][/color]
